attributes.action: Cancel GCSE Exams in 2022 - Think of the COVID impact on current year 10’s
attributes.additional_details: Review how Covid will impact the current pupils studying for 2022 GCSE’s and act now in announcing this year will be based on Predicted grades only.
attributes.background: Before the pressure on current year 10 pupils gets too much. Please announce now that the 2022 GCSE Exams will be based on predicted grades and not Exams!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760
